Text:
having some issues with the crack, where exactly am i supposed to put the .dat file and what file am i supposed to edit, where is it located?

thanks.

1) Install any products, ignoring warnings about missing licence files.
2) After installation, set the LM_LICENCE_FILE environmental variable path to point to the licence file from the crack folder(cadopia.dat).

To change the LM_LICENCE_FILE variable go to(for windows xp):
Start -> Settings -> Control Panel -> System -> Advanced -> Environment Variables

Enjoy!
